mapper.insert:
replace into ordercenter.oc_kj_seller_customs_declaration ( uid, seller_code, order_code, big_order_code, due_money, flag, type, bank_order_id, order_amount, money_type, create_time, update_time, remark, seller_name, trans_num, transport_money, auth_name, idcard, pay_gate ) values
( #{item.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sellerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bigOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dueMoney , jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.moneyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transNum , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transportMoney , jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payGate , jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from ordercenter.oc_kj_seller_customs_declaration where update_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and type = #{type}
